pages.text: $(li)The Enchanter will give you or near Villagers the Slowness effect, reducing the movement speed.$(br)$(li)It will give the Strenght effect to nearby Illagers too, making them inflict more damage.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop Leather, Gold Nuggets, Emeralds, or Diamonds.
$(br)The Enchanters are unable to attack you or other creatures.
